translations.title: Wired Beauty
translations.title.home.screen:
NEW ! DIFFERENT ! 
 BETTER ways to research skincare Hybrid clinical trials and consumer studies
translations.webinar: OUR WEBINAR ON ANTIOXYDATIVES - Register here ! TRUST PILOT - Best app for skin care research.
translations.home.section.1.text: Our technology allows us to obtain a number of consumer returns far superior to tests that would be done in laboratories. With broader data, which will help laboratories in their product studies.
translations.home.section.2.title: DIGITALLY ENABLED LAB & CONSUMER SKINCARE TESTING
translations.home.section.2: Our formula combines technological advances and dermatological research. With a key partner such as APHP, we were able to develop with their dermatology specialists this sensor technology which records different data on the condition of the skin to offer studies carried out on a wide audience.
